criterion_0_program.reasoning: Program is clearly identified as 'Youth-in-Agribusiness program (YIAP)'

criterion_0g_graduation.reasoning: No explicit mention of graduation/TUP program. Only has one component (start-up capital) without evidence of integrated package combining consumption support and productive assets

criterion_1_lmic.reasoning: Study conducted in Nigeria, which is a low-middle income country

criterion_2_cash.reasoning: While component_a is present, it is described as 'start-up capital' (one-time) without evidence of regular consumption support/cash transfers. Start-up capital alone should be assessed under Criterion 3 (productive assets) rather than Criterion 2 (consumption support)

criterion_3_assets.reasoning: component_b_present = false and no evidence of direct asset provision. While start-up capital is mentioned, there is no clear evidence of direct provision of productive assets

criterion_4_design.reasoning: Study uses quantitative impact evaluation methods (endogenous switching probit regression) and is_review_or_policy_analysis = false

criterion_6_completed.reasoning: completed = true, indicating study presents finished research findings
